property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ At the end of each of your turns, untap this creature. ■ Revolution 2—If you have 2 shields or less, your opponent can't cast spells other than light spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw 5 cards. Then discard cards from your hand equal to the number of your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 8 or more cards in your graveyard, you may shuffle all cards in your graveyard into your deck. If you do, each of your opponent's creatures gets -8000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield. If a shield was returned to your hand, this creature gets +3000 power and "double breaker" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Creatures can't attack. ■ Seals can't be removed from creatures.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your nature creatures gets "World Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution 2—When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put all non-evolution creatures that cost 3 or less into the battle zone and the rest into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While your opponent has 2 shields or less, you may summon creatures from your mana zone and at the end of your turn, you may return any number of evolution creatures from your mana zone to your hand. ■ Whenever one of your creatures is tapped by one of your opponent's spell effects or creature ability, untap all your creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, tap all your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may add one of your shields to your hand. Then you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. (You can use the "shield trigger" of shields added to your hand this way.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may choose a spell from among them, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your water creatures. {INVASION}-Water Command (When one of your Water Command attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature by the effect of a spell, if your opponent has 2 shields or less, your opponent can't choose one of your water creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. Then choose a shield in a shield zone. That shields owner shuffles it into their deck. At the end of the turn, that player puts the top card of their deck into their shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution 0 Trigger—Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may cast this spell for no cost. ■ Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a water creature, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand. ■ After you cast this spell, shuffle it into your deck instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Revolution 2—At the end of your turn, if you have 2 shields or less, you may put this creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a non-evolution darkness creature that costs 4 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. At the start of your opponent's next turn, destroy that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ At the end of each of your turns, you may put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If it's a creature, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have "blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. You may put an evolution creature from among the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield. ■ You may put a fire Command Dragon that costs 7 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone, and choose one of your opponent's shields. Your opponent puts that shield on the bottom of their deck. Then your opponent puts the top card of their deck into their shield face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Reveal the top 6 cards of your deck. Put all evolution creatures from among them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Revolution 2—When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, you may draw a card. Then you may put a non-evolution creature that costs 5 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While you are summoning this creature, you may reveal an evolution creature in your hand. If you do, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost 0 or less. ■ At the end of each of your turns, untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put a creature that costs 4 or less into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your light Commands cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ Mana Arms 3: If you have 3 light cards in your mana zone, your light Dragons cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules

property.value: ■ While you are summoning this creature, you may reveal an evolution creature in your hand. If you do, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost 0 or less. ■ This creature can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a 'Gachanko Minirobo No.2' from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While you are summoning this creature, you may reveal an evolution creature. If you do, reduce the summoning cost of thiscreature costs by up to 2. It can't cost 0 or less. {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your light creatures. {INVASION}-Light command that costs 9 (When one of your Light command that costs 9 attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Players can't put creatures into the battle zone except from their hand. ■ Whenever one of your creatures would leave the battle zone, you may discard a Light card that costs 9 from your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your water creatures. {INVASION}-Water command (When one of your Water command attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ When this creature would leave the battle zone, choose even or odd. Then your opponent reveals the top card of their deck and puts it on the bottom of their deck. If that card's cost is the same as that chosen parity, this creature stays in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature, put any number of creatures from your hand into the battle zone. Your opponent takes an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your darkness Creatures. {INVASION}-Darkness command (When one of your Darkness command attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature or one of your other creatures is destroyed, if this creature is tapped, destroy one of your opponent's creatures, then return a darkness creature (except 'Galloween, Super Revenge') from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a fire Dragon, you may put it into the battle zone. ■ Revolution 2—Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 2 shields or less, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. You may put a fire Dragon from among them into the battle zone. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. {INVASION}-Fire command (When one of your Fire command attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ While your opponent has 2 shields or less, this creature can't be destroyed.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on one of your nature creatures. {INVASION}-Nature evolution command (When one of your Nature evolution command attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {QUATTRO BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature or one of your nature creatures would be destroyed, put them into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on one of your nature creatures. {INVASION}-Nature creature that has power 6000 or more (When one of your Nature creature that has power 6000 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may put one of your other creatures into your mana zone. If you do, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put a Mystery Totem creature or nature Invader from among them. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
